name: LegrandConnectedHotelRoom
0:
”Alexa, set the thermostat to 20 degrees”
”Alexa, lower the temperature”
”Alexa, activate relax scene”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Legrand Hotel connected room skill allow the control of Legrand Guest room management system to create an unique Guest experience. Legrand provide all the products to control lights, curtains, sockets and room temperature that can be managed with Alexa.
